abortReason-required: Please give a reason why you chose to cancel this transaction
acceptTermsAndConditions: I accept the Terms and Conditions of sicuro.com GmbH
bankdata-iban-explanation: The IBAN (International Bank Account Number) is a coding system used to accelerate wire transfers within SEPA European Countries. If you have an IBAN, we can send you your payment into SEPA countries up to twice as fast! If your bank is in one of the SEPA Countries but you don't yet know your IBAN, please ask your bank. E.g. IT80X0542459106000000345213; SEPA Countries: EU, Euro zone countries (17) = Austria, Belgium, Cyprus, Estonia, France, Finland, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovak Republic, Slovenia and Spain. EU, non-Euro zone countries (10) = Bulgaria, Czech Republic, Denmark, Great Britain, Hungary, Latvia, Lithuania, Poland, Romania and Sweden. EEA zone countries (3+2) = Iceland, Norway, Liechtenstein - plus Monaco and Switzerland.
bankdata-swiftbic-explanation: The SWIFT Code(or "BIC" code) is an 8-11 character alphanumeric code used to send money wia wire transfer. If you don't know your SWIFT code, please ask your bank.
banner-description: With the brokerage service of sicuro.com, you can make your online business while being protected from scams and frauds. The online platform of sicuro.com is immediate and simple, and allows customers to start a new transaction with just a few clicks!
banner-title: <1>Sicuro.com</1> is the online platform that allows customers to buy and sell online in total safety
buyer-bank-payment-conditions: This payment method has no addtional costs.
buyer-confirmGoodsReception-info:
Please make sure that you are in full ownership of the domain(s) before confirming.

If you confirm receipt, the inspection period agreed with the seller will commence.

Select "confirm reception of domain(s)" to continue.
buyer-paypal-payment-conditions: This payment method has additional Paypal transfer fees of 3% from EU countries and 6% from non-EU countries.
confirmPaymentNotification-info:
Once you have made the payment, please send us a notification by clicking on "paymentperformed".

As soon as we receive the funds, you will get a confirmation e-mail.
confirmTransactionModified:
Are you sure you want to modify the terms of this transaction?

Remember that your partner in this transaction will have to review and agree to the terms you have modified.

Click "accept" to proceed.

slider1-text:
Thanks to the collaboration with Namecase,
sicuro.com offers the best service
to manage the sale or purchase of domain names
slider2-text:
Protect yourself against scams from online payments
and offer more guarantees to your buyers!
slider3-text:
Buy safely! We will send your payment to the seller
only when you have received and inspected the merchandise!
slider4-text:
Unfortunately scams and fraud are common in online transactions.
The intermediary’s role played by sicuro.com offers guarantees for both buyers and sellers. Sellers will be able to verify the amount paid before sending the merchandise and buyers will be able to receive and inspect the merchandise before the seller is paid. Sicuro.com receives a maximum fee of 3% of the transaction vale for this service, starting from 5€ only!
slider6-text: Check out our prices and fees on the pages listed below; our easy to use fee calculator allows you to quickly evaluate the exact price of your transaction. Follow this link to learn more.

TransactionConditionsViewHeader: Create Transaction, Step 4 of 5: - Define Transaction Conditions
TransactionConflictResolution-info:
Are you sure that you want to start the conflict resolution process?

You will have 60 days to provide us proof that you have started a legal case or have reached agreement with the buyer.

May we remind you that if we don't receive any communication within 60 days, we will consider the domain(s) to be correctly accepted.

TransactionProposal-explanation1: The Buyer has provided or modified the terms of this domain name transaction
TransactionProposal-explanation2: Please agree to or modify the terms
TransactionProposal-explanation3: If you agree, the Buyer may send payment to sicuro.com. If you Modify the terms, the Buyer will have to review and agree to the modified terms
TransactionServiceItemList: List of Service Items in Transaction
TransactionStatus-ABORTED_NOACTIVITY: has aborted the transaction due to the lack of activity from the involved parties. Transaction is canceled.
TransactionStatus-ABORTED_UNRESPONSIVE: The transaction has been canceled because the partner has not responded
TransactionStatus-ACCEPT_TERMS: accepted transaction Terms and Conditions. Buyer has to select payment method. Upon selection of payment method, the payment document (Payment request and Invoice) will be generated under the Buyers transaction view.
TransactionStatus-ACCEPT_TERMS-BUYER: has accepted transaction terms and conditions. Buyer has to select payment method. Upon selection of payment method, the payment document (Payment request and Invoice) will be generated under the transaction view of the Buyer. Buyer has to accredit exact amount stated on the payment request at the selected payment account of sicuro.com
TransactionStatus-ACCEPT_TERMS-SELLER: has accepted transaction terms and conditions. Buyer has to select payment method. Upon selaction of payment method the payment document (Payment requeset and Invoice) will be generated under the transaction view of the Buyer. Buyer has to accredit exact amount of payment request at the selected payment account of sicuro.com
TransactionStatus-BUYER_CHOOSE_PAYMENT_M: has chosen a payment method and the payment document (Payment request and Invoice) is now available under the transaction view of the Buyer. Buyer has to accredit the exact amount stated on the payment request at the selected payment account of sicuro.com
TransactionStatus-BUYER_CONFIRMS_GOODS_R: has confirmed reception of goods sent by seller.
TransactionStatus-BUYER_MADE_PAYMENT: Buyer has notified sicuro.com of payment. sicuro.com has to verify that the funds are fully available and confirm the buyers payment.
TransactionStatus-BUYER_PAYMENT_CONFIRME: has confirmed the buyers payment. Transfer or Pickup can be started.
TransactionStatus-BUYER_SENT_GOODS_TO_SE: has started return. Seller has to cooperate and coordinate with the Buyer about it. If the return is completed, the Buyer has to notify us about it and the Seller has to confirm.
has notified us of end of return process. This operation has to  be confirmed by Seller (or by sicuro.com)

Buyer didn’t act within the period of 10 days to start return. It is assumed that the buyer didn’t have any intentions to start return and has retained the delivery. sicuro.com has to pay Seller (if Seller’s payment account is still not available, Seller has to provide a payment account in oder to continue)
TransactionStatus-BUYER_TRANSACTION_PROP: has modified transaction conditions. Seller is required to read the new conditions and to accept or decline them
TransactionStatus-CONFLICT_RESOLUTION_EN: has received the final court order or the agreement between the parties and has to pay Buyer and/or Seller in accordance with the court order or the agreement between the parties. (if Buyer/Seller’s payment account is still not available, Buyer/Seller has to provide a payment account in order to continue).
TransactionStatus-CONFLICT_RESOLUTION_EX: Seller didn’t act within the period of 60 days to provide sicuro.com with an agreement with Buyer or a proof of launch of legal case/arbitrage. It’s assumed that the seller decided to accept the resent object of transaction. sicuro.com will now refund the Buyer (if Buyer’s payment account is still not available, Buyer has to provide a payment account to continue).
TransactionStatus-CONFLICT_RESOLUTION_IN: has updated the status of conflict resolution.
TransactionStatus-CONFLICT_RESOLUTION_ST: has started the conflict resolution and has 60 days to provide sicuro.com with an agreement with Buyer or with a proof of launch of legal case/arbitrage. If the Seller does not provide sicuro.com with an agreement with Buyer or with a proof of launch of legal case/arbitrage within the next 60 days, it’s assumed that the Seller abstains from launching the legal case/arbitrage and is retaining the delivery.

Seller didn’t act within the period of 10 days to start conflict resolution. It’s assumed that the Seller didn’t have any intention to start conflict resolution and has retained the delivery. sicuro.com has to refund the Buyer (if the Buyer’s payment account is still not available, the Buyer has to provide a payment account to continue).
TransactionStatus-CREATED: has created a new transaction. The Partner has to reply to it.
TransactionStatus-CREATED-BUYER: has created a new transaction. The Seller has to reply to it.
TransactionStatus-CREATED-SELLER: has created a new transaction. The buyer has to reply to it.
TransactionStatus-INSPECTION: has confirmed reception of goods. Inspection period of {0} days has started and expires at $Time/Date$
TransactionStatus-INSPECTION_EXCEEDED: Buyer’s inspection period of {0} days is expired without recourse. It is assumed that the buyer is satisfied. sicuro.com will proceed with the payment to the Seller.
TransactionStatus-INSPECTION_UNVALIDATED: has terminated the inspection period with a negative outcome. Buyer has 10 days to start return. Should the Buyer not act during the next 10 days it’s assumed that the buyer is retaining the delivery.
TransactionStatus-INSPECTION_VALIDATED: has terminated the inspection period with a positive outcome. sicuro.com has to pay the Seller
TransactionStatus-INSPECTION-BUYER: has confirmed delivery. Inspection period has been started. Buyer has to inspect delivery. Buyer has an inspection period of {0} days in which to retain or reject the delivery. The inspection period expires at {1}. Should the inspection period expire without Buyer response, it is assumed that the buyer is satisfied.
TransactionStatus-INSPECTION-SICURO: has confirmed delivery. Buyer’s inspection period has been started. Buyer has to inspect delivery. Buyer has an inspection period of {0} days in which to retain or reject the delivery. The inspection period expires at {1}. Should the inspection period expire without Buyer response, it is assumed that the buyer is satisfied.
TransactionStatus-NOTIFY_BUYER_OF_PAYMEN: sicuro.com has made refund to Buyer. Transaction is completed.
TransactionStatus-NOTIFY_SELLER_OF_PAYME: sicuro.com has made payment to Seller. Transaction is completed.
TransactionStatus-PAYMENT_MADE_TO_BUYER: has refunded the Buyer. Transaction is completed.
TransactionStatus-PAYMENT_MADE_TO_SELLER: sicuro.com has made payment to Seller. Transaction is completed
TransactionStatus-SELELR_INSPECTION_VALI: has terminated the inspection period with a positive outcome. sicuro.com has to refund the Buyer (if Buyer’s payment account is still not available, Buyer has to provide a payment account to continue).
TransactionStatus-SELLER_INSPECTION_EXCE: Seller’s inspection period of 5 days has expired without any recourse. It is assumed that the Seller is satisfied. sicuro.com has to refund the Buyer (if Buyer’s payment account is still not available, Buyer has to provide a payment account to continue).
TransactionStatus-SELLER_INSPECTION_UNVA: has terminated the inspection period with a negative outcome. Seller has 10 days to start conflict resolution. Should the Seller not act during the next 10 days it is assumed that the Seller has no intention to start conflict resolution and is retaining the delivery.
TransactionStatus-SELLER_INSPECTION-SELL: has confirmed delivery. Seller’s inspection period of 5 days has started. Seller has to inspect delivery. Should the inspection period expire without Seller’s response, it is assumed that the Seller is satisfied.
TransactionStatus-SELLER_INSPECTION-SICU: has confirmed delivery . Seller’s inspection period of 5 days has started. Seller has to inspect delivery. Should the inspection period expire without the Seller’s response, it is assumed that the Seller is satisfied.
TransactionStatus-SELLER_SENT_GOODS_TO_B: has confirmed the delivery. Buyer (otherwise sicuro.com) has to confirm it.
has started the transfer. Seller has to cooperate and coordinate with Buyer. If the transfer is completed, the Seller has to notify us about the delivery and the Buyer has to confirm.
has started the transfer. Buyer has to cooperate and coordinate with Seller. If the transfer is completed, the Seller has to notify us about the delivery and the Buyer has to confirm.
TransactionStatus-SELLER_TRANSACTION_PRO: has modified transaction Terms and Conditions. Buyer has to respond.

TransactionWarning1: Important Security Note: To avoid being defrauded by e-mails not originating from our service, you should always sign into this site and verify that the funds have been secured prior to transferring the domain name to the buyer

Thank you for accepting the transaction terms.

Please now review and accept our terms of service, which clarify your roles and duties during this transaction.

Click "accept" to proceed.

Upon agreement, the Terms and Conditions may no longer be modified.
